trans-unit.resname: J18·3 | Nin, the Pain Artist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Your body is a delicate instrument that tells me truths. These devices help me 'tune' that instrument."
trans-unit.target: "Your body is a delicate instrument that tells me truths. These devices help me 'tune' that instrument."

trans-unit.source: Commander's Sphere
trans-unit.target: Commander's Sphere

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

trans-unit.source: It harmonizes with the essence of its master.
trans-unit.target: It harmonizes with the essence of its master.

trans-unit.source: Teferi's Protection
trans-unit.target: Teferi's Protection

trans-unit.source: Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.) Exile Teferi's Protection.
trans-unit.target: Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.) Exile Teferi's Protection.

trans-unit.source: "Someday, when the world is safe again, my homeland will return."\n—Teferi
trans-unit.target: "Someday, when the world is safe again, my homeland will return."\n—Teferi

trans-unit.source: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
trans-unit.target: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

trans-unit.resname: J18·6 | Lord of Atlantis | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A master of tactics, the Lord of Atlantis makes his people bold in battle merely by arriving to lead them.
trans-unit.target: A master of tactics, the Lord of Atlantis makes his people bold in battle merely by arriving to lead them.

trans-unit.source: Rhystic Study
trans-unit.target: Rhystic Study

trans-unit.source: Exile a creature you control: Add X mana of any one color, where X is 1 plus the exiled creature's mana value. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.

trans-unit.source: Every predator is something else's prey.
